content: **knitted jacket in drops sky / drops merino extra fine and drops kid-silk the piece is worked top down with raglan v-neck and honeycomb pattern sizes xs/s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-175 yarn group b + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs/s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** colour/quality used in picture drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 03 grey fog and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-175-175-200-225 g colour 38 chalk or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550-600-650-700-800-850 g colour 08 light beige and use drops kid-silk fra garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-175-175-200-225 g colour 38 chalk drops buttons no 501 4-4-5-5-5-5 items **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality and needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm 21 stitches in width and 27 row in height with honeycomb pattern and 1 strand of each quality and needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
